targets.query: SELECT last("iowait")+last("system")+last("nice")+last("steal")+last("user") FROM "imperva_gw_sar_cpu" WHERE ("gatewayname" =~ /^$gateway$/ AND "cpu" = 'all') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("idle") FROM "imperva_gw_sar_cpu" WHERE ("gatewayname" =~ /^$gateway$/ AND "cpu" = 'all') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("load") FROM "imperva_gw_cpuload" WHERE ("gatewayname" =~ /^$gateway$/ AND "cpu" = 'all') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("system") FROM "imperva_gw_sar_cpu" WHERE ("gatewayname" =~ /^$gateway$/ AND "cpu" = 'all') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("user") FROM "imperva_gw_sar_cpu" WHERE ("gatewayname" =~ /^$gateway$/ AND "cpu" = 'all') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("iowait") FROM "imperva_gw_sar_cpu" WHERE ("gatewayname" =~ /^$gateway$/ AND "cpu" = 'all') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("nice") FROM "imperva_gw_sar_cpu" WHERE ("gatewayname" =~ /^$gateway$/ AND "cpu" = 'all') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("steal") FROM "imperva_gw_sar_cpu" WHERE ("gatewayname" =~ /^$gateway$/ AND "cpu" = 'all') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.description: Utilization based on the command "sar -P ALL 0".

targets.query: SELECT last("iowait")+last("system")+last("nice")+last("steal")+last("user") FROM "imperva_gw_sar_cpu" WHERE ("gatewayname" =~ /^$gateway$/ AND "cpu" =~  /^$cpu$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: GW SAR CPU Utilization - CPU: $cpu

targets.query: SELECT mean("user") FROM "imperva_gw_sar_cpu" WHERE ("gatewayname" =~ /^$gateway$/ AND "cpu" = 'all') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "cpu" fill(none)

panels.description: Utilization based on the command "sar -P ALL 0".
